snippet: Li and Wu are dominated by Garriques and Verdasco at the Hopman Cup.
abstract: Li and Wu are dominated by Garriques and Verdasco at the Hopman Cup.
lead_paragraph: PERTH, Australia--Though sanctioned as the official mixed team championships of the International Tennis Federation, the annual Hyundai Hopman Cup in Perth is occasionally derisively referred to as an exhibition, the sort of low-stakes tennis crowd-pleaser oft-called a "hit-and-giggle."

headline.main: Deflating Defeats in the Burswood Bubble
